languages.text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy for every two of the Operative's allies who have the enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This can trigger on multiple enemies.
languages.original_text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} накладывает на противника +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g} за каждых двух своих союзников, у которых эта цель находится в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Эффект может сработать на несколько противников.

traits.locale_text: Each ally in the area of Study Enemies adds an additional clue to the distribution.
At the start of the turn, the Adept inflicts one exploit on an enemy for every two of the Adept's allies who have the enemy in their line of sight. This can trigger on multiple enemies.

At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy for every two of the Operative's allies who have the enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This can trigger on multiple enemies.

At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy for every two of the Operative's allies who have the enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This can trigger on multiple enemies.

languages.text: В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} накладывает на противника +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g} за каждых двух своих союзников, у которых эта цель находится в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Эффект может сработать на несколько противников.
languages.original_text: Each ally in the area of Study Enemies adds +1 stack of the exploit effect to the total amount of the ability.

traits.locale_text: Каждый союзник в области действия Изучения целей добавляет +1 к общему числу уязвимостей.
Каждый союзник в области действия Изучения целей добавляет +1 к общему числу уязвимостей.

languages.text: 每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，如果有敌人暴露在盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}中，则每有两名盟友看到该名敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}就会对该名敌人施加1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果。此效果可以影响多名敌人。
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy for every two of the Operative's allies who have the enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This can trigger on multiple enemies.

traits.locale_text: 每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，如果有敌人暴露在盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}中，则每有两名盟友看到该名敌人，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}就会对该名敌人施加1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果。此效果可以影响多名敌人。

languages.text: Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} a un enemigo por cada dos aliados del agente que tengan al enemigo en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. Se puede activar para múltiples enemigos.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy for every two of the Operative's allies who have the enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This can trigger on multiple enemies.

traits.locale_text: Al principio del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el agente inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} a un enemigo por cada dos aliados del agente que tengan al enemigo en su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. Se puede activar para múltiples enemigos.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}に敵がいる{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の仲間2人につき、オペレーターが敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}をひとつ適用する。この効果は複数の敵に発動可能。
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy for every two of the Operative's allies who have the enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This can trigger on multiple enemies.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}に敵がいる{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}の仲間2人につき、オペレーターが敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}をひとつ適用する。この効果は複数の敵に発動可能。

languages.text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} fügt der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} einem Gegner +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g} für jeweils zwei Verbündeten zu, die den Gegner in ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} haben. Dies kann bei mehreren Gegnern ausgelöst werden.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy for every two of the Operative's allies who have the enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This can trigger on multiple enemies.

traits.locale_text: Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} fügt der Agent einem Feind 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} pro jeweils zwei eigenen Verbündeten zu, die den Feind in ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} haben. Dies kann bei mehreren Feinden ausgelöst werden.

languages.text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} inflige +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} à un ennemi pour chaque groupe de deux alliés ayant l'ennemi dans leur {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Peut être déclenché sur plusieurs ennemis.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy for every two of the Operative's allies who have the enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This can trigger on multiple enemies.

traits.locale_text: Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} inflige +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} à un ennemi pour chaque groupe de deux alliés ayant l'ennemi dans leur {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Peut être déclenché sur plusieurs ennemis.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Ajan{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}görüş hattında{/g} düşman olan her iki dost birimi için bir düşmanda +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürü{/g} oluşturur. Bu etki, birden çok kez tetiklenebilir.
languages.original_text: At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy for every two of the Operative's allies who have the enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This can trigger on multiple enemies.
